string.dontUnderstand: Entschuldigung, das habe ich nicht verstanden.

item.description: Change 'type' above to try different Selector Component Types like Sequencer

items.content: Say 'financial scam', if your accounts or loans are affected. 'moving scam', to report a moving company or movers. say Identity theft, to report someone using your personal information. or 'imposter', if the scam involves deception or threats, including romance scams, and phishing. say 'something else' if none of these categories apply.
That is not a category I know about. I'm here to help, so please try again. Also, if you need to speak to a human about your scam, say help.
